column1: The family will receive friends from 6-8 PM Monday June 22
column2: 2015 at Gentry Family Funeral Service in Yadkinville. His funeral will be conducted at 3:00 PM Tuesday June 23
column3: 2015 at Northwood Baptist Church by Pastor Allen Barker and Rev. Jonathan Barker. He will lie in state 30 minutes prior to the service. Burial will follow in the church cemetery.
